long_description: Some things get better with age, like fine wine and Teva sandals. It's been 30 years since the women's Teva Original Sandals debuted, and they're better than ever and built to last. Nylon webbing ankle straps adjust with rip-and-stick closures. Anatomic EVA topsoles provide extra support and comfort; open-toe construction doesn't allow water to pool. Compression-molded EVA midsoles offer all-day cushioning. The women's Teva Original Sandals have durable rubber outsoles for good traction on wet surfaces.
short_description: Some things get better with age, like fine wine and Teva sandals. It's been 30 years since the women's Teva Original Sandals debuted, and they're better than ever and built to last.
